meanings.definition: A person who works in a library and helps people find books and information.
meanings.sent1: The librarians at the library assisted me in locating a book on dinosaurs.
meanings.sent2: I always see the librarians busy organizing shelves and helping visitors.
meanings.sent3: The librarians decided to have a book-themed costume party for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of knowledge, librarians are the guiding stars for seekers.
meanings.sent5: The image of librarians with glasses and books is iconic and recognizable.

meanings.definition: The group of people who work in a library.
meanings.sent1: Our local library has a friendly team of librarians who are always ready to help.
meanings.sent2: During the event, the librarians efficiently managed the crowd and resources.
meanings.sent3: The librarians collectively decided to redecorate the reading area with a beach theme.
meanings.sent4: The librarians, like a well-oiled machine, ensure the library runs smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of librarians to their work is truly admirable and inspiring.
